participants.name: Tejal Wagadia - I am hiring
participants.title: Talent Revisionist|Frustrated Recruiter Blogger| Part-time Wonder Woman|Avid Reader|Technology Enthusiast| Coffee Lover|

messages.message:
Web Developer at DriveTime

Hi Brian, 

I am reaching out to you in regards to a FTE opportunity with my company DriveTime in Tempe, AZ. 

We are looking for an experienced Web Developer to come and help take this company to the next level. We are currently working with the latest technologies to build custom web based applications using API's, typescript, JS, React. 

A little about us, we were recently named one of the best places to work for by the Phoenix Business Journal, an award we have held for the past few years. You can also preview our company's profile on Muse (https://www.themuse.com/companies/drivetime).

Here is the link to the job description.http://jobs.drivetime.com/sr-web-application-developer/job/6280493
Let me know when you have a few moments to chat about the opportunities at DriveTime.

Riddhi
602-667-2550
Corporate Technical Recruiter
DriveTime
I would love that. Thank you for reaching out and being so direct. I just took another position though.
